snippet: The South Korean golfer Jiyai Shin has a new hair color and new hope that she can reclaim the success that had once been predicted for her on the L.P.G.A. Tour.
abstract: The South Korean golfer Jiyai Shin has a new hair color and new hope that she can reclaim the success that had once been predicted for her on the L.P.G.A. Tour.

headline.main: For Shin, a New Look and New Hope on the L.P.G.A. Tour
